definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Eunice's father was a wealthy businessman with powerful connections.
sentences.chinese: 尤尼斯的父亲是一位富商具有强大的连接。

sentences.english: He was a successful businessman and future inheritor to the family firm's substantial wealth.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位令人羡慕的富商和家族企业的继承人。

sentences.english: Jia men and women are rich businesspeople and professionals.
sentences.chinese: 甲等男女属于富商以及专业人士。

sentences.english: His campaign workers went to businessmen who had become rich because of high protective tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 他的竞选工作人员到谁已因高保护性关税富商。

sentences.english: Lin Junyan, a young, handsome rich merchant, meets Bai Mengzhu, a naive beauty with nice personality.
sentences.chinese: 年轻英俊的富商林俊彦偶遇美丽脱俗的白梦竹。

sentences.english: The bride was the daughter of a local businessmen who made his money in textiles.
sentences.chinese: 新娘是当地一名纺织业富商的千金。

sentences.english: Li Bai, the son of a wealthy merchant, grew up in Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 李白生长在四川省，是一个富商的儿子。

sentences.english: She was engaged to a rich businessman by her parents.
sentences.chinese: 她的父母把她许配给了一位富商。

sentences.english: The teaching building was built with money invested by a rich businessman.
sentences.chinese: 这座教学楼是一位富商大贾投资修建的。

sentences.english: The new arts centre is the brain-child of a wealthy local businessman.
sentences.chinese: 这座新艺术馆是根据当地一位富商的构想而修建的。

sentences.english: Lau, 34, is the son of a wealthy Hong Kong businessman.
sentences.chinese: 她的男友刘建浩是香港富商之子，现年34岁。

sentences.english: In London he found a job helping the cook of a rich merchant.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦，他找到一份工作，为一个富商的厨师做帮厨。

sentences.english: However, he found that his father died for a long time owing to business failure.
sentences.chinese: 石父原是大富商，唯因生意失败，早已去世。

definition: rich and powerful/rich and influential person/big shot
thousand jin 斤 (pounds) of gold/money and riches/(honorific) invaluable (support)/(honorific) daughter
Monopoly (game)/known as 大富翁[Da4 fu4 weng1] in PRC
